alert.note: Alert for Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 9:44PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Craven and central Carteret Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 944 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Michael J Smith Airport, or near Harkers Island, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morehead City, Harkers Island, Cedar Island, South River, North River, Merrimon, Sealevel, Marshallberg, Davis, Straits, Smyrna, Atlantic, Otway, Williston, Great Neck, Open Grounds Farm, Stacy, Bettie, Michael J Smith Airport and Rachel Carson Estuarine Reserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for eastern North Carolina.
